titleStmt.title: A sarmon, of Ihon Oecolampadius, to yong men, and maydens
titleStmt.author: Oecolampadius, Johann, 1482-1531.
Foxe, John, 1516-1587.

publicationStmt.publisher: By me Humfrey Powell, dwellyng aboue Holburne conduit. And are to be sould by Hugh Syngleton, dwellyng at the sygne of Saint Augustine, in Poules church yarde,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the sygne of Saint Augustine, in Poules church yarde
